text: 16.30 For the purposes of this policy, impacts on the amenity of neighbouring occupiers include odours, fumes and other air pollution, TOWN CENTRES excess noise and vibrations, reduction in daylight and/or sunlight to habitable rooms, reduction in level of privacy for residents. It is also essential to ensure that development within a town centre does not undermine the operations of other businesses operating in the centre, this includes retaining access routes at all necessary times, retaining sufficient yard or servicing space where relevant, and retaining any existing amenity space such as external seating.
